title: PBE bug [League of Legends 5.22.15_10_30_02_02 client]
body: Graves shotgun makes him...... well..... a bif flashy. When he is super close to a structure, his bullets flashes over like 5000 units behind the structure!

replies.body:
Hey Yinless,

For PBE issues, please use the [Report a Bug](http://pbr.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/pbe/en_BE/bugReport/create) section on the PBE boards. It helps us better keep track of issues on live versus PBE. :]
